Direction (Question 78 to 81): Read the following information carefully and answer the question given below:

‘A+B’ means ‘A’ is the son of B’; ‘A-B’ means ‘A is the wife of B’;  ‘A×B’ means ‘A is the brother of B; ‘A ÷ B’ means ‘A is the mother of B’ is the mother of B’ and ‘A = B’ means ‘A’ is the sister of B’.
Q.78. What is does P + R  Q mean?
(A) Q is the father of P.
(B) Q is the son of P.
(C) Q is the uncle of P.
(D) Q is the brother of P.
(A) P is the brother of Q.
(B) P is the father of Q.
(C) P is the uncle of Q.
(D) P is the nephew of Q.
Q.80. What does P = R + Q means?
(A) P is the aunt of Q.
(B) P is the daughter of Q.
(C) P is the niece of Q.
(D) P is the sister of Q.
Q.81. What does P = R Q means?
(A) P is the aunt of Q.
(B) P is the sister of Q.
(C) Q is the niece of P.
(D) Q is the daughter of P.
Q.82. If P $ Q means P is father of Q; P # Q means 'P is mother of Q; P * Q means P is sister of Q, then how is D related to N in N # A $ B * D ?
